title: Sulegg
text: The Sulegg is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Bernese%20Alps">Bernese Alps</a>, overlooking <a href="Saxeten">Saxeten</a> in the <a href="Bernese%20Oberland">Bernese Oberland</a>. It lies on the group between the Saxettal and the Soustal, on the left side of the <a href="Lauterbrunnental">Lauterbunnen</a> valley.
